app.name: Qingyi Esports

pricing.promo.desc2: Members get longer dispute windows and priority support.

faq.title: Understand the rules quickly

faq.promise.desc2: Reach support via tickets or admin when needed.

faq.footer.title: Have more questions?

login.title: Qingyi Esports
login.sub: Games are more than games. Companions can change life.
login.tip: Login works only on HTTPS or localhost. Please use a secure domain.
